Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: Human prostate cancer cell line PC3, colon cancer cell line COLO320DM and glioblastoma cell line U87 were purchased from ATCC and cultured in DMEM/F12 with 10% FBS. Human glioblastoma GBM39 tumor spheroid was derived from patient tissue, and cultured in DMEM/F12 with GlutaMAX, B27, 20 ng/ml EGF, 20 ng/ml FGF and 5 μg/ml heparin.
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: DNA library was constructed by NEBNext Ultra II DNA Library Prep kit for paired-end sequencing.
Sample_data_processing: Bowtie2 for mapping, MarkDuplicates from Picard tools v1.119 to remove PCR duplicates, Samtools v1.3.1, MACS2 2.1.2 for peak calling.
ATAC-seq: Briefly, 100-500K cell nuclei were extracted by NPB buffer (5% BSA, 0.2% IGEPAL-CA630, 1 mM DTT, EDTA-free protease, in PBS) at 4°C for 10 min. Tagmentation was done in TB buffer (33 mM Tris-acetate pH 7.8, 66 mM K-acetate, 11 mM Mg-acetate, 16% DMF) with Tn5 transposase (Illumina), at 37°C for 30 min. DNA samples were then extracted and DNA libraries were generated by PCR. ChIP-seq: Formaldehyde crosslinked chromatin from 5 million cells per ChIP was sheared to small fragments by Covaris M220 Focused-ultrasonicator. The following antibodies were used for chromatin pull-down in RIPA buffer with protease inhibitor cocktail: anti-H3K27ac (Active Motif 39685, 5 µg), anti-H3K4me1 (Active Motif 39297, 10 µl), anti-CTCF (Abcam ab70303, 5 µg), anti-SMC3 (Abcam ab9263, 5 µg). After capturing by Protein A/G magnetic beads, chromatin was washed 6 times and reverse-crosslinked for 3 hr with RNase A and Proteinase K.

Sample_data_processing: Bowtie2 for mapping, MarkDuplicates from Picard tools v1.119 to remove PCR duplicates, Samtools v1.3.1, MACS2 2.1.2 for peak calling.
ATAC-seq: Briefly, 100-500K cell nuclei were extracted by NPB buffer (5% BSA, 0.2% IGEPAL-CA630, 1 mM DTT, EDTA-free protease, in PBS) at 4°C for 10 min. Tagmentation was done in TB buffer (33 mM Tris-acetate pH 7.8, 66 mM K-acetate, 11 mM Mg-acetate, 16% DMF) with Tn5 transposase (Illumina), at 37°C for 30 min. DNA samples were then extracted and DNA libraries were generated by PCR. ChIP-seq: Formaldehyde crosslinked chromatin from 5 million cells per ChIP was sheared to small fragments by Covaris M220 Focused-ultrasonicator. The following antibodies were used for chromatin pull-down in RIPA buffer with protease inhibitor cocktail: anti-H3K27ac (Active Motif 39685, 5 µg), anti-H3K4me1 (Active Motif 39297, 10 µl), anti-CTCF (Abcam ab70303, 5 µg), anti-SMC3 (Abcam ab9263, 5 µg). After capturing by Protein A/G magnetic beads, chromatin was washed 6 times and reverse-crosslinked for 3 hr with RNase A and Proteinase K.

Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: Human prostate cancer cell line PC3, colon cancer cell line COLO320DM and glioblastoma cell line U87 were purchased from ATCC and cultured in DMEM/F12 with 10% FBS. Human glioblastoma GBM39 tumor spheroid was derived from patient tissue, and cultured in DMEM/F12 with GlutaMAX, B27, 20 ng/ml EGF, 20 ng/ml FGF and 5 μg/ml heparin.
